abstract: “You cannot seriously talk about the ‘Right to Rise’ and support laws that deny the right to vote.” — Hillary Rodham Clinton, offering sharp criticism of Jeb Bush’s policies at the 2015 National Urban League Conference.

headline.main: Verbatim: Hillary Clinton Jabs at Jeb Bush’s ‘Right to Rise’

snippet: “You cannot seriously talk about the ‘Right to Rise’ and support laws that deny the right to vote.” — Hillary Rodham Clinton, offering sharp criticism of Jeb Bush’s policies at the 2015 National Urban League Conference.
